title: Bloomberg Markets: Vertex Jumps as Drug Cocktails Aid Patients
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Vertex Jumps as Drug Cocktails Aid Patients
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tatiana Darie Health Care Stocks Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc. surging on Wednesday as its experimental new drug combinations helped more cystic fibrosis patients breathe far better than doctors and investors expected, opening a path to improved treatment for almost all patients with the lung disorder.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
